{{flavour|The soft and supple scaly skin of a steam dragon. It may be turned into proper armour by magical means.}}

A '''steam dragon hide''' isn't a particularily impressive armour... In fact, it's almost the same as a lowly [[robe]]. However, it does provide two ranks of [[steam]] resistance, and can be enchanted with a [[scroll of enchant armour]] to turn it into a much more desirable [[steam dragon armour]].

You may find one after butchering a [[steam dragon]] corpse.

==History==
Steam dragon hides were removed in [[0.19]].
